title: Learner-Centered Blended Education Course for Strengthening Digital System Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Electronics and Digital Logic Circuits
context.additional_context: Designed for learners in managerial/leadership roles to improve digital system design and problem-solving skills in workplaces. Implemented in limited tech environments using smartphones and simple graphic tablets

learning_goals: Learners solve work-related problems by applying design principles of digital logic gates and combinational circuits
Learners write digital systems project reports based on peer feedback in a flipped learning environment
Learners achieve an 80%+ accuracy rate in logic circuit analysis problems using a smartphone-based quiz system
Learners present digital systems design simulation results in project-based assessments conducted in 4-week cycles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
